<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.2.1
<SEQUENCE>4
<FILENAME>a2189901zex-10_21.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.2.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.2.1</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CONSULTING AGREEMENT</font></u></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Consulting Agreement (&#147;Consulting
Agreement&#148;) is entered into this 5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;day of
September, 2008 (the &#147;Effective Date&#148;), by and between Mace Siegel, an
individual (&#147;Consultant&#148;), and The Macerich Company, a Maryland corporation
(the &#147;Company&#148;). &#160;Consultant and the
Company agree as follows:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">I.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Engagement</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company hereby engages
Consultant and Consultant hereby accepts such engagement, upon the terms and
conditions hereinafter set forth, for the Consulting Term. &#160;The &#147;Consulting Term&#148; is the period of time
commencing on the Effective Date and ending on the first to occur of: &#160;(1)&nbsp;August&nbsp;31, 2013; (2)&nbsp;the
date of Consultant&#146;s death or disability (defined as a serious and continuing
medical condition which prevents Consultant from performing or substantially
performing as a consultant under this Agreement for a minimum of sixty (60)
days, such as a heart attack or stroke); (3)&nbsp;Consultant&#146;s written notice
to the Company that he elects to terminate the Consulting Term for any reason;
or (4)&nbsp;the date that Consultant materially breaches one of his obligations
or agreements under this Consulting Agreement, provided, however, that if the
purported breach is a breach of Consultant&#146;s obligations under Section&nbsp;II.A
or II.C, Consultant shall be given written notice of the alleged breach&#160; and a thirty (30) day opportunity to cure the
alleged breach to the extent a cure is reasonably possible in the circumstances
and provided, further, that if the purported breach is the first breach of
Consultant&#146;s obligations under Section&nbsp;VI, Consultant shall be given
written notice of the alleged breach and an opportunity to cure the alleged
breach, which cure may be reasonably specified (both as to time, manner and
content) by the Company.&#160; The notice and
opportunity to cure specified in subparagraph (4)&nbsp;shall not be required
for any breach of Consultant&#146;s obligations under Section&nbsp;VI after the
first such breach, regardless of whether a prior breach was cured.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=711976,FOLIO='1',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KY_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">II.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Service</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Performance</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consultant shall perform
consulting services as requested by the Company with reasonable notice as to
matters with which Consultant is familiar or about which Consultant has
acquired knowledge, expertise, or experience.&#160;
The Company is not obligated to call upon Consultant to provide any
services or any minimum level of services.&#160;
In no event shall Consultant be required to perform services to the
Company on more than 3 days in any one month or at a location outside of
Southern California.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nature of
Consulting Services</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Only the Company&#146;s Chief
Executive Officer or President may request that Consultant provide consulting
services to the Company pursuant to this Consulting Agreement.&#160; Consultant shall report the results of his
consulting services to the Company&#146;s Chief Executive Officer or President.&#160; Except (i)&nbsp;as may expressly be
authorized by the Chief Executive Officer or the President of the Company, and (ii)&nbsp;for
such contact (if any) as may reasonably be authorized by the Company&#146;s Board of
Directors (&#147;Board&#148;) and arranged through the Chief Executive Officer for
Consultant to fulfill his obligations as a member of the Board, and (iii)&nbsp;for
contact (if any) with the Company&#146;s Board of Directors and/or employees at the
level of Senior Executive Vice President or higher (in each case under this
clause (iii), only if such contact occurs while Consultant is a director of the
Company), Consultant shall not have any business contact with any other officer
or employee of the Company or its affiliates.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Competent
Service</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consultant agrees to
honestly and faithfully conduct himself at all times during the performance of
consulting services for the Company. &#160;Consultant
agrees to perform his services in a diligent and competent manner.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=743320,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KY_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">III.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Compensation</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In consideration for the
services to be provided by Consultant, the Company will pay Consultant a
Consulting Fee of FORTY ONE THOUSAND ONE HUNDRED SIXTY SIX DOLLARS AND SIXTY
SEVEN CENTS ($41,166.67) each month (the &#147;Consulting Fee&#148;). &#160;The first Consulting Fee shall be paid to
Consultant for September&nbsp;2008. &#160;The
Consulting Fee shall continue after September&nbsp;2008 and will be paid for
each month in the Consulting Term through and including the month in which the
Consulting Term ends, whether or not Consultant is called upon to perform
services during that month.&#160; Except as
expressly provided in Section&nbsp;IV in the event of Consultant&#146;s death or
disability (as such term is defined in Section&nbsp;I) during the Consulting
Term, no Consulting Fee shall be payable with respect to any month following
the month in which the Consulting Term ends.&#160;
The Consulting Fee for a particular month shall be paid not later than
fifteen days following that month.&#160; The
Company shall have no obligation to pay or reimburse any expenses incurred by
Consultant in performing the services.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IV.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Termination</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon termination or
expiration of the Consulting Term pursuant to Section&nbsp;I, this Agreement
shall terminate without further obligations to or by the Consultant under this
Agreement, other than for payment of Consultant&#146;s Consulting Fee through the
month in which the Consulting Term ends (to the extent not theretofore paid);
provided that if the Consulting Term ends due to Consultant&#146;s death or
disability (as defined in Section&nbsp;I), the Company shall continue to pay
the Consulting Fee to Consultant (or Consultant&#146;s estate, in the event of
Consultant&#146;s death) through August&nbsp;31, 2013 as though the Consulting Term
had not ended upon Consultant&#146;s death or disability; provided, further, that in
the event of such a termination of the Consulting Term due to such a disability
of Consultant, the Company&#146;s obligation to continue to pay the Consulting Fee
as though the Consulting Term had not ended upon Consultant&#146;s death or
disability is subject to the condition precedent that Consultant</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=71280,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KY_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">not
breach any of Consultant&#146;s other obligations or agreements under this Consulting
Agreement (except the obligation to perform the consulting services pursuant to
Section&nbsp;II.A) as though the Consulting Term had continued in effect
through August&nbsp;31, 2013.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">V.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Relationship</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Independent
Contractor</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consultant shall operate at
all times under this Consulting Agreement as an independent contractor of the
Company.&#160; Nothing in this Consulting
Agreement shall alter or limit the rights or obligations of Consultant as a
member of the Board.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Agency</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Consulting Agreement
does not authorize Consultant to act as an agent of the Company or any of its
affiliates or to make commitments on behalf of the Company or any of its
affiliates. &#160;Consultant and the Company
intend that an independent contractor relationship be created by this Consulting
Agreement, and nothing herein shall be construed as creating an
employer/employee relationship, partnership, joint venture, or other business
group or concerted action. &#160;Consultant
shall at no time hold himself out as an agent of the Company or any of its
affiliates for any purpose, including reporting to any governmental authority
or agency, and shall have no authority to bind the Company or any of its
affiliates to any obligation whatsoever.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Taxes</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consultant and the Company
agree that Consultant is not an employee for state or federal tax purposes. &#160;Consultant shall be solely responsible for any
taxes due as a result of the payment of any consulting fee or other
compensation pursuant to this Consulting Agreement. &#160;Consultant will defend and indemnify the
Company and each of its affiliates from and against any tax arising out of
Consultant&#146;s failure to pay such taxes with respect to any such payments. &#160;If the Company reasonably determines that
applicable law requires that taxes should be withheld from any payments</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=935368,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KY_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">or
other compensation and benefits pursuant to this Consulting Agreement, the
Company reserves the right to withhold, as legally required, and to notify
Consultant accordingly.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">D.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Workers&#146;
Compensation and Unemployment Insurance</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consultant is not entitled
to workers&#146; compensation benefits or unemployment compensation benefits
provided by the Company. &#160;Consultant
shall be solely responsible for the payment of his workers&#146; compensation, unemployment
compensation, and other such payments. &#160;The
Company will not pay for workers&#146; compensation for Consultant. &#160;The Company will not contribute to a state
unemployment fund for Consultant.&#160; The
Company will not pay the federal unemployment tax for Consultant.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">E.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Benefits</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consultant shall not be
entitled to participate in any vacation, medical, retirement, or other health
and welfare or fringe benefit plan of the Company by virtue of this Consulting
Agreement, and Consultant shall not make claim of entitlement any such employee
plan, program or benefit on the basis of this Consulting Agreement.&#160;&#160; Nothing in this Consulting Agreement is
intended, however, to supersede or otherwise affect Consultant&#146;s rights to
continued medical, dental or group health or life insurance coverage following
his termination of employment with the Company pursuant to COBRA.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">VI.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Non-Disparagement</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consultant agrees that he
will not at any time during the Consulting Term, (1)&nbsp;directly or
indirectly, make or ratify any statement, public or private, oral or written,
to any person that denigrates or disparages, either professionally or
personally, the Company, any of its subsidiaries or affiliates, or any of their
respective directors, officers, or employees, successors or products, past and
present, or (2)&nbsp;make any statement or engage in any conduct that has the
purpose (or which a reasonable person reasonably should have known would likely
have the effect) of disrupting the business of the Company or any of its
subsidiaries or affiliates. &#160;Nothing
herein shall abridge, limit,</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">or
modify in any way Consultant&#146;s duties or responsibilities as a Director of the
Company, or from disclosing such information in a truthful manner as may be
required by law, or by judicial or administrative process or order or the rules&nbsp;of
any securities exchange or similar self-regulatory organization applicable to
such party.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">VII.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Miscellaneous</u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Successors</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Consulting Agreement is
personal to each of Consultant and the Company and shall not, without the prior
written consent of the other, be assignable by either of them; provided,
however, that in the event any person acquires all or substantially all of the
business or assets of the Company (by purchase, merger, or otherwise), this
Consulting Agreement shall inure to the benefit of and be binding upon such
other person.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Waiver and
Modification</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No waiver of any breach of
any term or provision of this Consulting Agreement shall be construed to be,
nor shall be, a waiver of any other breach of this Consulting Agreement. &#160;No waiver shall be binding unless in writing
and signed by the party waiving the breach. &#160;This Consulting Agreement may not be amended
or modified other than by a written agreement executed by Consultant and an
authorized officer of the Company.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">C.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Complete
Agreement</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Consulting Agreement
constitutes and contains the entire agreement and final understanding
concerning Consultant&#146;s consulting relationship with the Company and its
affiliates, and the other subject matters addressed herein between the parties,
and it supersedes and replaces all prior negotiations and all agreements
proposed or otherwise, whether written or oral, concerning the subject matters
hereof provided, however, that Consultant&#146;s confidentiality, proprietary
information, trade secret and similar obligations under any existing agreement
with the Company shall continue.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">D.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Severability</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If any provision of this
Consulting Agreement or the application thereof is held invalid, the invalidity
shall not affect other provisions or applications of the Consulting Agreement
which can be given effect without the invalid provisions or applications and to
this end the provisions of this Consulting Agreement are declared to be
severable.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">E.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Choice of Law</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Consulting Agreement
shall be deemed to have been executed and delivered within the State of
California, and the rights and obligations of the parties hereunder shall be
construed and enforced in accordance with, and governed by, the laws of the
State of California without regard to principles of conflict of laws.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Advice of
Counsel</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In entering this Consulting
Agreement, the parties represent that they have relied upon the advice of their
attorneys, who are attorneys of their own choice, and that the terms of this
Consulting Agreement have been completely read and explained to them by their
attorneys, and that those terms are fully understood and voluntarily accepted
by them. &#160;Each party has cooperated in
the drafting and preparation of this Consulting Agreement. &#160;Hence, in any construction to be made of this
Consulting Agreement, the same shall not be construed against any party on the
basis that the party was the drafter.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">G.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Counterparts</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Consulting Agreement
may be executed in counterparts, and each counterpart, when executed, shall
have the efficacy of a signed original.&#160;
Photographic copies of such signed counterparts may be used in lieu of
the originals for any purpose.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">H.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Headings</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The section headings
contained in this Consulting Agreement are inserted for convenience only and
shall not affect in any way the meaning or interpretation of this Consulting
Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=997648,FOLIO='7',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KY_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*&#160; *&#160; *</font></p>

<p align="center" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I have read the foregoing
Consulting Agreement and I accept and agree to the provisions it contains and
hereby execute it voluntarily with full understanding of its consequences.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXECUTED this 24th day of
December, 2008, in the State of California, with the effective date as set
forth above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=8,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=964865,FOLIO='8',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KY_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:11 2009' -->

</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.5.1
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>a2189901zex-10_51.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.5.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 10.5.1</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AMENDMENT NUMBER 1<br>
TO<br>
THE MACERICH COMPANY<br>
DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN<br>
FOR EXECUTIVES<br> </font></b>(As Amended and Restated Effective as of January&nbsp;1,
2003)</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, The
Macerich Company (the &#147;Company&#148;) has established and maintains The Macerich
Company Deferred Compensation Plan for Executives (As Amended and Restated
Effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2003) (the &#147;Plan&#148;) to provide supplemental
retirement income benefits through deferrals of salary and bonuses for certain
Eligible Employees (as defined in the Plan); and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, the Plan
was frozen December&nbsp;31, 2004, so that the benefits provided thereunder
would be exempt from application of Section&nbsp;409A of the Internal Revenue
Code of 1986 (the &#147;Code&#148;); and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, the
exercise of discretion permitted under certain provisions of the Plan could
subject its benefits to the application of Section&nbsp;409A of the Code; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, the Company
has determined that it is appropriate and desirable to amend the Plan pursuant
to Section&nbsp;9.4 of the Plan as set forth herein to eliminate such
discretion.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOW, THEREFORE</font></b>, the
Plan is hereby amended as set forth below, effective January&nbsp;1, 2005.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section&nbsp;7.2 of the Plan is hereby
deleted.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The second sentence of Section&nbsp;9.4
of the Plan is amended to read as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event that this Plan is terminated,
the amounts credited to a Participant&#146;s Deferral Account and Company Matching
Account shall be distributed to the Participant or, in the event of his or her
death, to his or her Beneficiary in a lump sum within thirty (30) days
following the date of termination; provided, however, if the foregoing
provision would cause any amounts deferred under this Plan to be subject to Section&nbsp;409A
of the Code, such provision shall not apply and distributions to the
Participants or their Beneficiaries shall be made on the dates on which the
Participants or their Beneficiaries would receive benefits hereunder without
regard to the termination of the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="5",CHK=975860,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KU_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:09 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF,</font></b>
the Company has caused its duly authorized officers to execute this amendment
this 30th day of October, 2008.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="45%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:45.68%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Senior Executive Vice President,</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.9%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="45%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:45.68%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Chief Financial Officer&nbsp;&amp; Treasurer</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="5",CHK=914906,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KU_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:09 2009' -->

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.5.3
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>a2189901zex-10_53.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.5.3
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 10.5.3</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AMENDMENT NUMBER 1<br>
TO<br>
THE MACERICH COMPANY<br>
2005 DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN<br>
FOR EXECUTIVES</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, The
Macerich Company (the &#147;Company&#148;) has established and maintains The Macerich
Company 2005 Deferred Compensation Plan for Executives (the &#147;Plan&#148;) to provide
supplemental retirement income benefits through deferrals of salary and bonuses
for certain Key Employees (as defined in the Plan); and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, the Plan is
intended to comply with the requirements of Section&nbsp;409A of the Internal
Revenue Code of 1986 (the &#147;Code&#148;), and Section&nbsp;9.4 of the Plan provides
for the amendment of the Plan to ensure such compliance and to add provisions
that so comply; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, Treasury
Regulations and Internal Revenue Service guidance promulgated since the adoption
of the Plan necessitate and allow certain amendments to the Plan in order to
maintain compliance with Section&nbsp;409A of the Code; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, the Company
has determined that it is appropriate and desirable to amend the Plan in a
manner that complies with such regulations and guidance.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOW, THEREFORE</font></b>, the
Plan is hereby amended as set forth below, effective January&nbsp;1, 2009, or
such other date or dates as may be specified below.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE I<br>
TITLE AND DEFINITIONS</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section&nbsp;1.2 of the Plan is amended by
changing the definition of &#147;Company Matching Amount&#148; to read as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Company Matching Amount&#148; shall mean an
amount equal to a percentage, determined by the Company in its sole discretion
no later than the December&nbsp;31 immediately preceding a Plan Year, of the
amount of Compensation deferred under the Plan for the Plan Year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE III<br>
DEFERRAL ELECTIONS</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section&nbsp;3.1(a)&nbsp;of the Plan is
amended in its entirety, effective from the inception of the Plan, to read as
follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Elections to Defer</u>. &#160;Each Eligible Employee may elect to defer
Compensation for any Plan Year by filing with the Committee an election that
conforms to the requirements of this Section&nbsp;3.1, on a form provided by
the Committee, no later than the December&nbsp;15 immediately preceding such
Plan Year (or such later date that the Committee determines, but in no event
later than December&nbsp;31) in which the </font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="6",CHK=755470,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KK_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:06 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Compensation is to be earned.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, an Eligible
Employee who is a participant in the Prior Plan may make such election on such
form under this Plan with respect to the Eligible Employee&#146;s Bonus earned for
service in 2004 and payable in 2005 no later than December&nbsp;15, 2004 (or
such later date that the Committee determines, but in no event later than December&nbsp;31,
2004).&#160; The Committee shall notify each
Eligible Employee of his or her eligibility to participate in the Plan at least
10 days prior to the time he or she must file an election for participation.&#160; Each participation election shall signify the
portion of the Eligible Employee&#146;s Salary or Bonus, as applicable, that he or
she elects to defer.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Subsection (e)&nbsp;is hereby added to Section&nbsp;3.1
of the Plan to read as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Hardship Withdrawal Cancellation
of Election</u>.&#160; Notwithstanding the
foregoing, in the event that an Eligible Employee who has elected to defer
Compensation for a Plan Year pursuant to this Section&nbsp;3.1 receives a
hardship withdrawal during such Plan Year from a 401(k)&nbsp;Plan maintained by
the Company, the Eligible Employee&#146;s election to defer Compensation hereunder
shall be cancelled immediately upon such Eligible Employee&#146;s receipt of such
hardship withdrawal.&#160; No Eligible
Employee may elect to defer Compensation pursuant to this Section&nbsp;3.1, and
no such election shall take effect, if the election would result in the
deferral of Compensation within six (6)&nbsp;months after the Eligible Employee
has received a hardship withdrawal from a 401(k)&nbsp;Plan maintained by the
Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE VI<br>
DISTRIBUTIONS</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section&nbsp;6.2 of the Plan is amended
in its entirety to read as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Small
Benefits</u>.</p>

<p style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything herein contained to
the contrary, if on the date that any installment payment is to be made to a
Participant (or the Participant&#146;s Beneficiary) hereunder the remaining balance
in the Participant&#146;s Accounts is less than $10,000, then the entire remaining
balance in the Participant&#146;s Accounts shall be paid in the form of a cash lump
sum to the Participant (or the Participant&#146;s Beneficiary) on the date scheduled
for such installment payment.&#160; This
provision is intended to comply with Treasury Regulations Section&nbsp;1.409A-2(b)(2)(iii)&nbsp;and
shall be interpreted accordingly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Article&nbsp;VI of the Plan is amended
by adding a new Section&nbsp;6.4 thereto, subsection (a)&nbsp;thereof to be
effective January&nbsp;1, 2007 and subsection (b)&nbsp;thereof to be effective January&nbsp;1,
2008, to read as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Transition
Relief Distribution Elections</u>.</p>

<p style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Notwithstanding the provisions of
Sections 6.1(b)&nbsp;and 6.3 hereof, a Participant may elect to change his or her
distribution election under Section&nbsp;6.1 by filing a new election with the
Committee on or after January&nbsp;1, 2007 and on or before </font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="6",CHK=325203,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KK_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:06 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">December&nbsp;31, 2007.&#160; In making such election change, a Participant
may elect a scheduled in-service distribution only if the Participant elected a
scheduled in-service distribution in connection with his or her initial
enrollment in the Plan.&#160; Any such
election change shall apply only to amounts that would not otherwise be payable
in 2007 and shall not cause any amount to be paid in 2007 that would not
otherwise be payable in 2007.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Notwithstanding the provisions of
Sections 6.1(b)&nbsp;and 6.3 hereof, a Participant may elect to change his or
her distribution election under Section&nbsp;6.1 by filing a new election with
the Committee on or after January&nbsp;1, 2008 and on or before December&nbsp;31,
2008.&#160; Any such election change shall
apply to the balance in the Participant&#146;s Accounts on January&nbsp;1, 2009 and
amounts credited thereafter, and may select any of the optional forms of
distribution specified in Section&nbsp;6.1(a)&nbsp;(including a scheduled
in-service distribution on a specified date on or after January&nbsp;1, 2009)
without regard to whether any distribution (including any scheduled in-service
distribution) previously has been made pursuant to a prior election.&#160; Any such election change shall apply only to
amounts that would not otherwise be payable in 2008 and shall not cause any
amount to be paid in 2008 that would not otherwise be payable in 2008.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE IX<br>
MISCELLANEOUS</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The fourth sentence of Section&nbsp;9.4
of the Plan is amended to read as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event that this Plan is terminated in
accordance with the provisions of either paragraph (A)&nbsp;or (B)&nbsp;of
Treasury Regulations Section&nbsp;1.409A-3(j)(4)(ix), the amounts credited to a
Participant&#146;s Deferral Account and Company Matching Account shall be
distributed to the Participant or, in the event of his or her death, to his or
her Beneficiary in a lump sum within thirty (30) days following the date of
termination; provided, however, if the Plan is terminated under circumstances
to which such provisions do not apply, distributions to the Participants or
their Beneficiaries shall be made on the dates on which the Participants or
their Beneficiaries would receive benefits hereunder without regard to the
termination of the Plan or as otherwise required or permitted by applicable
law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF,</font></b>
the Company has caused its duly authorized officer to execute this amendment
this 30<font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font>&#160;day of October, 2008.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.16%;">

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.42%;">

  </td>
  <td width="46%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:46.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Senior Executive Vice President, Chief</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.16%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="46%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:46.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Legal Officer&nbsp;&amp; Secretary</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="6",CHK=743995,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KK_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:06 2009' -->

</BODY>
</HTML>
</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.6.1
<SEQUENCE>7
<FILENAME>a2189901zex-10_61.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.6.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 10.6.1</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AMENDMENT NUMBER 1<br>
TO<br>
THE MACERICH COMPANY<br>
DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN<br>
FOR SENIOR EXECUTIVES<br> </font></b>(As Amended and Restated Effective as of January&nbsp;1,
2003)</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, The
Macerich Company (the &#147;Company&#148;) has established and maintains The Macerich Company
Deferred Compensation Plan for Senior Executives (As Amended and Restated
Effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2003) (the &#147;Plan&#148;) to provide supplemental
retirement income benefits through deferrals of salary and bonuses for certain
Eligible Employees (as defined in the Plan); and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, the Plan
was frozen December&nbsp;31, 2004, so that the benefits provided thereunder
would be exempt from application of Section&nbsp;409A of the Internal Revenue
Code of 1986 (the &#147;Code&#148;); and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, the
exercise of discretion permitted under certain provisions of the Plan could
subject its benefits to the application of Section&nbsp;409A of the Code; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, the Company
has determined that it is appropriate and desirable to amend the Plan pursuant
to Section&nbsp;10.4 of the Plan as set forth herein to eliminate such
discretion.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOW, THEREFORE</font></b>, the
Plan is hereby amended as set forth below, effective January&nbsp;1, 2005.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section&nbsp;7.2 of the Plan is hereby
deleted.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The second sentence of Section&nbsp;10.4
of the Plan is amended to read as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event that this Plan is terminated,
the amounts credited to a Participant&#146;s Deferral Account and Company Matching
Account shall be distributed to the Participant or, in the event of his or her
death, to his or her Beneficiary in a lump sum within thirty (30) days
following the date of termination; provided, however, if the foregoing
provision would cause any amounts deferred under this Plan to be subject to Section&nbsp;409A
of the Code, such provision shall not apply and distributions to the
Participants or their Beneficiaries shall be made on the dates on which the
Participants or their Beneficiaries would receive benefits hereunder without
regard to the termination of the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="7",CHK=243616,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KE_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:04 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF,</font></b>
the Company has caused its duly authorized officers to execute this amendment
this 30th day of October, 2008.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>
