<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">against whom enforceability is sought shall be sufficient to evidence
the existence of this Agreement.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;">&nbsp;</h2>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;22.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Headings</u>.&#160; The headings of the paragraphs of this
Agreement are inserted for convenience only and shall not be deemed to
constitute part of this Agreement or to affect the construction thereof.</p>

<h2 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;">&nbsp;</h2>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;23.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Modification
and Waiver</u>.&#160; No supplement,
modification or amendment of this Agreement shall be binding unless executed in
writing by both of the parties hereto.&#160;
No waiver of any of the provisions of this Agreement shall be deemed or
shall constitute a waiver of any other provisions hereof (whether or not
similar) nor shall such waiver constitute a continuing waiver.</p>

<h2 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;">&nbsp;</h2>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;24.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Notices</u>.&#160; All notices, requests, demands and other communications
hereunder shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been duly given if (i)&nbsp;delivered
by hand and receipted for by the party to whom said notice or other
communication shall have been directed or (ii)&nbsp;mailed by certified or
registered mail with postage prepaid, on the third business day after the date
on which it is so mailed:</p>

<h2 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;">&nbsp;</h2>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>If to Indemnitee, to the address
set forth on the signature page&nbsp;hereto.</h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;">&nbsp;</h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>If to the Company, to:</h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;">&nbsp;</h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Macerich
Company</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">401 Wilshire
Blvd., Suite&nbsp;700</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Santa Monica,
CA 90401</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Attn:&#160; Chief Legal Officer</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">or to such other address as may have been furnished in writing to
Indemnitee by the Company or to the Company by Indemnitee, as the case may be.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;25.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Governing
Law</u>.&#160; The parties agree that this
Agreement shall be governed by, and construed and enforced in accordance with,
the laws of the State of Maryland, without regard to its conflicts of laws
rules.</p>

<h2 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;">&nbsp;</h2>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;26.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Miscellaneous</u>.&#160; Use of the masculine pronoun shall be deemed
to include usage of the feminine pronoun where appropriate.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:50.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Address:</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=12,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="13",CHK=951787,FOLIO='12',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-LC_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:13 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXHIBIT A</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">FORM&nbsp;OF UNDERTAKING TO REPAY EXPENSES ADVANCED</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Board of Directors of The Macerich Company</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Re:&#160; Undertaking to Repay
Expenses Advanced</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Ladies and Gentlemen:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This
undertaking is being provided pursuant to that certain Indemnification
Agreement dated the <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
day of <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>,
20<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>, by and between <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>,
a Maryland corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;), and the undersigned Indemnitee (the &#147;Indemnification
Agreement&#148;), pursuant to which I am entitled to advance of expenses in
connection with <b>[Description of Proceeding]</b> (the &#147;Proceeding&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Terms used herein
and not otherwise defined shall have the meanings specified in the
Indemnification Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I am subject
to the Proceeding by reason of my Corporate Status or by reason of alleged
actions or omissions by me in such capacity.&#160;
I hereby affirm my good belief that at all times, insofar as I was
involved as <b>[a director]</b>  <b>[an officer]
</b>of the Company, in any of the facts or events giving rise to the
Proceeding, I (1)&nbsp;did not act with bad faith or active or deliberate
dishonesty, (2)&nbsp;did not receive any improper personal benefit in money,
property or services and (3)&nbsp;in the case of any criminal proceeding, had
no reasonable cause to believe that any act or omission by me was unlawful.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In
consideration of the advance of Expenses by the Company for reasonable
attorneys&#146; fees and related expenses incurred by me in connection with the
Proceeding (the &#147;Advanced Expenses&#148;), I hereby agree that if, in connection
with the Proceeding, it is established that (1)&nbsp;an act or omission by me
was material to the matter giving rise to the Proceeding and (a)&nbsp;was
committed in bad faith or (b)&nbsp;was the result of active and deliberate
dishonesty or (2)&nbsp;I actually received an improper personal benefit in
money, property or services or (3)&nbsp;in the case of any criminal proceeding,
I had reasonable cause to believe that the act or omission was unlawful, then I
shall promptly reimburse the portion of the Advanced Expenses relating to the
claims, issues or matters in the Proceeding as to which the foregoing findings
have been established.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS
WHEREOF, I have executed this Affirmation and Undertaking on this <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>
day of <u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>,
20<u>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THIS
AGREEMENT</font></b> is among <b>THE MACERICH COMPANY</b>,
a Maryland corporation (the &#147;Corporation&#148;), <b>THE MACERICH
PARTNERSHIP, L.P</b>., a Delaware limited partnership (the &#147;Operating
Partnership&#148;), and the Participant named above (the &#147;Participant&#148;) and is
delivered under The Macerich Company 2003 Equity Incentive Plan which includes
any applicable programs under the Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">W</font></u>&nbsp;<u>I</u>&nbsp;<u>T</u>&nbsp;<u>N</u>&nbsp;<u>E</u>&nbsp;<u>S</u>&nbsp;<u>S</u>&nbsp;<u>E</u>&nbsp;<u>T</u>&nbsp;<u>H</u></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>,
pursuant to the Plan, the Corporation has granted to the Participant with
reference to services rendered and to be rendered to the Company, effective as
of the Award Date, a restricted stock award (the &#147;Restricted Stock Award&#148; or &#147;Award&#148;),
upon the terms and conditions set forth herein and in the Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOW
THEREFORE</font></b>, in consideration of services rendered and to be
rendered by the Participant and the mutual promises made herein and the mutual
benefits to be derived therefrom, the parties agree as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Defined
Terms</u></b>.&#160; Capitalized terms used
herein and not otherwise defined herein shall have the meaning assigned to such
terms in the Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Grant</u></b>.&#160; Subject to the terms of this Agreement and
the Plan, the Corporation grants to the Participant a Restricted Stock Award
with respect to an aggregate number of shares of Common Stock, par value $.01
per share (the &#147;Restricted Stock&#148;) set forth above.&#160; The consideration for the shares issuable
with respect to the Award on the terms set forth </p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1) Subject to adjustment under Section 6.2 of the Plan and the terms
of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="14",CHK=113170,FOLIO='1',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-11_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:10 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">in this Agreement includes services and other
consideration in an amount not less than the minimum lawful consideration under
Maryland law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">3.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Vesting</u></b>.&#160; The Award shall vest, and restrictions (other
than those set forth in Section&nbsp;6.4 of the Plan) shall lapse, with respect
to the portion of the total number of shares (subject to adjustment under Section&nbsp;6.2
of the Plan), as reflected in the Vesting Schedule above, subject to earlier
termination or acceleration as provided herein or in the Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Continuance
of Employment Required</u></b>.&#160; The
Participant agrees to provide services to the Company in consideration for the
conditional rights to the unvested shares of Restricted Stock subject to the
Award granted hereunder.&#160; Except as
otherwise provided in Sections 8(c)&nbsp;or 9 or pursuant to the Plan, the
Vesting Schedule requires continued service through each applicable vesting
date as a condition to the vesting of the applicable installment and rights and
benefits under this Agreement.&#160; Partial
service, even if substantial, during any vesting period will not entitle the
Participant to any proportionate vesting or avoid or mitigate a termination of
rights and benefits upon or following a termination of employment or service as
provided in Section&nbsp;8 below or under the Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Dividend
and Voting Rights</u></b>.&#160; After the
Award Date, the Participant shall be entitled to cash dividends and voting
rights with respect to the shares of Restricted Stock subject to the Award even
though such shares are not vested, provided that such rights shall terminate
immediately as to any shares of Restricted Stock that cease to be eligible for
vesting.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">6.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Restrictions
on Transfer</u></b>.&#160; Prior to the time
they become vested, neither the shares of Restricted Stock comprising the
Award, nor any other rights of the Participant under this Agreement or the Plan
may be transferred, except as expressly provided in Sections 1.8 and 4.1 of the
Plan.&#160; No other exceptions have been
authorized by the Committee.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">7.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Stock
Certificates</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Book
Entry Form; Information Statement; Power of Attorney</u></b>.&#160; The Corporation shall issue the shares of
Restricted Stock subject to the Award in book entry form, registered in the
name of the Participant with notations regarding applicable restrictions on
transfer.&#160; Concurrent with the execution
and delivery of this Agreement, the Corporation shall deliver to the
Participant a written information statement with respect to such shares, and,
to the extent requested, the Participant shall deliver to the Corporation an
executed stock power, in blank, with respect to such shares.&#160; The Participant, by acceptance of the Award,
shall be deemed to irrevocably appoint, and does so irrevocably appoint, the
Corporation and each of its authorized representatives as the Participant&#146;s
true and lawful attorney(s)-in-fact (with full power of substitution) with
irrevocable power and authority in the name of and on behalf of the Participant
to (1)&nbsp;effect any transfer of unvested, forfeited shares (or shares
otherwise reacquired by Corporation hereunder) to the Corporation as may be
required pursuant to the Plan or this Agreement, and (2)&nbsp;execute and
deliver on behalf of the Participant any and all documents and instruments as
the Corporation or such representatives may determine to be necessary or
advisable in connection with any such transfer.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="14",CHK=426415,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-11_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:10 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Certificates
to be Held by Corporation; Legend</u></b>.&#160;
Any certificates representing Restricted Stock that the Participant may
be entitled to receive from the Corporation prior to vesting shall be
redelivered to the Corporation to be held by the Corporation until the
restrictions on such shares shall have lapsed and the shares shall thereby have
become vested or the shares represented thereby have been forfeited hereunder.&#160; Such certificates shall bear the following
legend:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;The transferability of
this certificate and the shares of stock represented hereby are subject to the
terms and conditions contained in an Agreement entered into between the
registered owner, The Macerich Partnership L.P. and The Macerich Company.&#160; A copy of such Agreement is on file in the
office of the Secretary of The Macerich Company, 401 Wilshire Boulevard, Suite&nbsp;700,
Santa Monica, California 90401.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Delivery
of Certificates Upon Vesting</u></b>.&#160;
Promptly after the lapse or other release of restrictions, a certificate
or certificates evidencing the number of shares of Common Stock as to which the
restrictions have lapsed or been released or such lesser number as may be
permitted pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.5 of the Plan shall be delivered to the
Participant or other person entitled under the Plan to receive the shares.&#160; The Participant or such other person shall
deliver to the Corporation any representations or other documents or assurances
required pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.4 of the Plan.&#160; The shares so delivered shall no longer be
restricted shares hereunder.&#160; Pursuant to
Section&nbsp;1.7 of the Plan, fractional share interests shall be disregarded,
but may be accumulated.&#160; The Committee,
however, may determine that cash, securities or other property will be paid or
transferred in lieu of fractional share interests.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Effect
of Termination of Employment</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Forfeiture
after Certain Events</u></b>.&#160; Except as
provided in Sections&nbsp;8(c)&nbsp;and 9 hereof, the Participant&#146;s shares of
Restricted Stock shall be forfeited to the extent such shares have not become
vested upon the date the Participant is no longer employed by the Company for
any reason, whether with or without cause, voluntarily or involuntarily.&#160; If an entity ceases to be a Subsidiary, such
action shall be deemed to be a termination of employment of all employees of
that entity, but the Committee, in its sole and absolute discretion, may make
provision in such circumstances for accelerated vesting of some or all of the
remaining restricted shares under any Awards held by such employees, effective
immediately prior to such event.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Return
of Shares</u></b>.&#160; Upon the occurrence
of any forfeiture of shares of Restricted Stock hereunder, such unvested,
forfeited shares shall, without payment of any consideration by the Corporation
for such transfer, be automatically transferred to the Corporation, without any
other action by the Participant, or the Participant&#146;s Beneficiary or Personal
Representative, as the case may be.&#160; The
Corporation may exercise its powers under Section&nbsp;7(a)&nbsp;hereof and
take any other action necessary or advisable to evidence such transfer.&#160; The Participant, or the Participant&#146;s
Beneficiary or Personal Representative, as the case may be, and the Operating
Partnership shall deliver any additional documents of transfer that the
Corporation may request to confirm the transfer of such unvested, forfeited
shares to the Corporation.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="14",CHK=3143,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-11_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:10 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Qualified
Termination Upon or Following Change in Control Event</u></b>.&#160; [Subject to Section&nbsp;18,] if the
Participant upon or not later than 12 months following a Change in Control
Event has a Qualified Termination (as defined in Section&nbsp;7.1(gg) of the
Plan) or terminates his or her employment for Good Reason, then any portion of
the Award that has not previously vested shall thereupon vest, subject to the
provisions of Sections 6.2(a), 6.2(e), 6.4 and 6.5 of the Plan and Sections 11
and 12 of this Agreement.&#160; As used in this
Agreement, the term &#147;Good Reason&#148; means a termination of employment by the
Participant for any one or more of the following reasons, to the extent not
remedied by the Company within a reasonable period of time after receipt by the
Company of written notice from the Participant specifying in reasonable detail
such occurrence, without the Participant&#146;s written consent thereto: (1)&nbsp;&nbsp;an
adverse and significant change in the Participant&#146;s position, duties,
responsibilities or status with the Company;&#160;
(2)&nbsp;&nbsp;a change in the Participant&#146;s principal office location
to a location farther away from the Participant&#146;s home which is more than 30
miles from the Participant&#146;s principal office;&#160;
(3)&nbsp;&nbsp;the taking of any action by the Company to eliminate
benefit plans without providing substitutes therefor, to materially reduce
benefits thereunder or to substantially diminish the aggregate value of the
incentive awards or other fringe benefits; provided that if neither a surviving
entity nor its parent following a Change in Control Event is a publicly-held
company, the failure to provide stock-based benefits shall not be deemed Good
Reason if benefits of comparable value using recognized valuation methodology
are substituted therefor; and provided further that a reduction or elimination
in the aggregate of not more than 10% in aggregate benefits in connection with
across the board reductions or modifications affecting persons similarly
situated of comparable rank in the Company or a combined organization shall not
constitute Good Reason;&#160; (4)&nbsp;&nbsp;any
reduction in the Participant&#146;s Base Salary; or (5)&nbsp;&nbsp;any material
breach by the Company of any written employment or management continuity
agreement with the Participant.&#160; For
purposes of the definition of &#147;Good Reason,&#148; the term &#147;Base Salary&#148; means the
annual base rate of compensation payable as salary to the Participant by the
Company as of the Participant&#146;s date of termination, before deductions or
voluntary deferrals authorized by the Participant or required by law to be
withheld from the Participant by the Company, and salary excludes all other
extra pay such as overtime, pensions, severance payments, bonuses, stock
incentives, living or other allowances, and other benefits and perquisites.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Effect
of Total Disability, Death or Retirement</u></b>.&#160; If the Participant incurs a Total Disability
or dies while employed by the Company, then any portion of his or her Award
that has not previously vested shall thereupon vest, subject to the provisions
of Sections 6.4 and 6.5 of the Plan.&#160; If
the Participant&#146;s employment with the Company terminates as a result of his or
her Retirement, the Committee may, on a case-by-case basis and in its sole
discretion, provide for partial or complete vesting prior to Retirement of that
portion of his or her Award that has not previously vested.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Adjustments
Upon Specified Events</u></b>.&#160; Upon the
occurrence of certain events relating to the Corporation&#146;s stock contemplated
by Section&nbsp;6.2 of the Plan, the Committee shall make adjustments as it
deems appropriate in the number and kind of securities or other consideration
that may become vested under an Award.&#160;
If any adjustment shall be made under Section&nbsp;6.2 of the Plan or a
Change in Control Event shall occur and the shares of Restricted Stock are not
fully vested upon such Event or prior thereto, the restrictions applicable to
such shares of Restricted Stock shall continue in effect with respect to any
consideration or </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="14",CHK=85706,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-11_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:10 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">other securities (the &#147;<u>Restricted Property</u>&#148;
and, for the purposes of this Agreement, &#147;Restricted Stock&#148; shall include &#147;Restricted
Property,&#148; unless the context otherwise requires) received in respect of such
Restricted Stock.&#160; Such Restricted
Property shall vest at such times and in such proportion as the shares of
Restricted Stock to which the Restricted Property is attributable vest, or
would have vested pursuant to the terms hereof if such shares of Restricted
Stock had remained outstanding.&#160;
Notwithstanding the foregoing, to the extent that the Restricted
Property includes any cash, the commitment hereunder shall become an unsecured
promise to pay an amount equal to such cash (with earnings attributable thereto
as if such amount had been invested, pursuant to policies established by the
Committee, in interest bearing, FDIC-insured (subject to applicable insurance
limits) deposits of a depository institution selected by the Committee) at such
times and in such proportions as the Restricted Stock would have vested.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Possible
Early Termination of Award</u></b>.&#160; As
permitted by Section&nbsp;6.2(b)&nbsp;of the Plan, and without limiting the
authority of the Committee under other provisions of Section&nbsp;6.2 of the
Plan or Section&nbsp;8 of this Agreement, the Committee retains the right to
terminate the Award, to the extent it has not vested, upon a dissolution of the
Corporation or a reorganization event or transaction in which the Corporation
does not survive (or does not survive as a public company in respect of its
outstanding common stock).&#160; This Section&nbsp;11
is not intended to prevent future vesting of the Award if it (or a substituted
award) remains outstanding following a Change in Control Event.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Limitations
on Acceleration and Reduction in Benefits in Event of Tax Limitations</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Limitation
on Acceleration</u></b>.&#160; Notwithstanding
anything contained herein [(except as otherwise provided in Section&nbsp;18
hereof)] or in the Plan or any other agreement to the contrary, in no event
shall the vesting of any share of Restricted Stock be accelerated pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.3
of the Plan or Section&nbsp;8(c)&nbsp;hereof to the extent that the Company
would be denied a federal income tax deduction for such vesting because of Section&nbsp;280G
of the Code and, in such circumstances, the restricted shares not subject to
acceleration will continue to vest in accordance with and subject to the other
provisions hereof.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Reduction
in Benefits</u></b>.&#160; If the Participant
would be entitled to benefits, payments or coverage hereunder and under any
other plan, program or agreement that would constitute &#147;parachute payments,&#148;
then, notwithstanding any other provision hereof, such &#147;parachute payments&#148;
shall be reduced or modified in such manner, if any, as may be specified in
[the MCA referenced in Section&nbsp;18 hereof, in which case the provisions of Section&nbsp;12(a)&nbsp;hereof
shall not apply, and, to the extent permitted by the MCA, in] any other
then-existing agreement between the Company and the Participant (other than any
Stock Option Agreement, Stock Appreciation Right Agreement or Restricted Stock
Award Agreement under Plan).&#160; If after
the application of any &#147;parachute payment&#148; reduction provision in any such
other agreement the provisions of Section&nbsp;12(a)&nbsp;hereof continue to
apply to the vesting of Restricted Stock hereunder, then the Participant may
designate by written notice to the Secretary of the Corporation the order in
which &#147;parachute payments&#148; under this Restricted Stock Award Agreement and any
other Restricted Stock Award Agreements, Stock Option Agreements and Stock
Appreciation Right Agreements under the Plan shall be reduced or modified so
that the Company is not denied </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="14",CHK=906419,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-11_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:10 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">federal income tax deductions for any &#147;parachute
payments&#148; because of Section&nbsp;280G of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Determination
of Limitations</u></b>.&#160; The term &#147;parachute
payments&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in and be determined in accordance
with Section&nbsp;280G of the Code and regulations issued thereunder.&#160; All determinations required by this Section&nbsp;12,
including without limitation the determination of whether any benefit, payment
or coverage would constitute a parachute payment, the calculation of the value
of any parachute payment and the determination of the extent to which any
parachute payment would be nondeductible for federal income tax purposes
because of Section&nbsp;280G of the Code, shall be made by an independent
accounting firm (other than the Corporation&#146;s outside auditing firm) having
nationally recognized expertise in such matters selected by the Committee.&#160; Any such determination by such accounting
firm shall be binding on the Corporation, its Subsidiaries and the Participant.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">13.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Tax
Withholding</u></b>.&#160; The entity within
the Company last employing the Participant shall be entitled to require a cash
payment by or on behalf of the Participant and/or to deduct from other
compensation payable to the Participant any sums required by federal, state or
local tax law to be withheld with respect to the payment of dividends or the
vesting of any Restricted Stock, but, in the alternative the Participant or
other person in whom the Restricted Stock vests may irrevocably elect, in such
manner and at such time or times prior to any applicable tax date as may be
permitted or required under Section&nbsp;6.5 of the Plan and rules&nbsp;established
by the Committee, to have the entity last employing the Participant withhold
and reacquire shares of Restricted Stock at their Fair Market Value at the time
of vesting to satisfy any minimum withholding obligations of the Company with
respect to such vesting.&#160; Any election to
have shares so held back and reacquired shall be subject to such rules&nbsp;and
procedures, which may include prior approval of the Committee, as the Committee
may impose, and shall not be available if the Participant makes or has made an
election pursuant to Section&nbsp;83(b)&nbsp;of the Code with respect to such
Award.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">14.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Notices</u></b>.&#160; Any notice to be given under the terms of
this Agreement shall be in writing and addressed to the Corporation at its
principal office located at 401 Wilshire Boulevard, Suite&nbsp;700, Santa
Monica, California 90401, to the attention of the Corporate Secretary and to
the Participant at the address given beneath the Participant&#146;s signature
hereto, or at such other address as either party may hereafter designate in
writing to the other.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">15.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Plan</u></b>.&#160; The Award and all rights of the Participant
with respect thereto are subject to, and the Participant agrees to be bound by,
all of the terms and conditions of the provisions of the Plan, incorporated
herein by reference, to the extent such provisions are applicable to Awards
granted to Eligible Persons.&#160; The
Participant acknowledges receipt of a copy of the Plan, which is made a part
hereof by this reference, and agrees to be bound by the terms thereof.&#160; Unless otherwise expressly provided in other
Sections of this Agreement, provisions of the Plan that confer discretionary
authority on the Committee do not (and shall not be deemed to) create any
rights in the Participant unless such rights are expressly set forth herein or
are otherwise in the sole discretion of the Committee specifically so conferred
by appropriate action of the Committee under the Plan after the date hereof.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="14",CHK=603603,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-11_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:10 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">16.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>No
Service Commitment by Company</u></b>.&#160;
Nothing contained in this Agreement or the Plan constitutes an
employment or service commitment by the Company, affects the Participant&#146;s
status as an employee at will who is subject to termination without cause,
confers upon the Participant any right to remain employed by the Company,
interferes in any way with the right of the Company at any time to terminate
such employment, or affects the right of the Company to increase or decrease
the Participant&#146;s other compensation or benefits.&#160; Nothing in this Section, however, is intended
to adversely affect any independent contractual right of the Participant
without his or her consent thereto.&#160;
Employment for any period of time (including a substantial period of
time) after the Award Date will not entitle the Participant to any
proportionate vesting or avoid or mitigate a termination of rights and benefits
upon or following a termination of employment as provided in Section&nbsp;3 or
8 above if the express conditions to vesting set forth in such Sections have
not been satisfied.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">17.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Limitation
on Participant&#146;s Rights</u></b>.<b>&#160; </b>This Award confers no<b>  </b>rights or interests other than as herein provided.&#160; This Agreement creates only a contractual
obligation on the part of the Corporation as to amounts payable and shall not
be construed as creating a trust.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">[18.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Other Agreements</u></b>.&#160; If any provision of this Agreement is inconsistent
with any provision of the Management Continuity Agreement between the
Corporation and Participant, as it may be amended from time-to-time (the &#147;MCA&#148;),
the provisions of the MCA shall control and shall be deemed incorporated herein
by reference.]</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[This
provision and the language in brackets in Sections 8(c), 12(a)&nbsp;and 12(b)&nbsp;are
to be included only in agreements with Participants subject to a MCA.]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

  <td width="46%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:46.92%;">

  Chief Legal Officer&nbsp;&amp; Secretary</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THE
MACERICH COMPANY</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">RESTRICTED
STOCK AWARD</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">INFORMATION
STATEMENT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">General
Information</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This information
statement has been provided to &#171;Name&#187;
(the &#147;Participant&#148;) in connection with a Restricted Stock Award granted to the
Participant by The Macerich Company, a Maryland corporation (the &#147;Corporation&#148;),
pursuant to a Restricted Stock Award Agreement dated as of [<u>March]</u>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
among the Participant, the Corporation and The Macerich Partnership, L.P. (the &#147;Award
Agreement&#148;) under the Corporation&#146;s 2003 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;).&#160; Capitalized terms used herein and not
otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the
Agreement and the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Restricted Stock
issued to the Participant pursuant to the Award Agreement will be represented
in book entry form.&#160; This information
statement is provided to the Participant pursuant to &#167;2-210 of the Maryland
General Corporation Law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Award Summary</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="93%" style="border-collapse:collapse;margin-left:.5in;width:93.32%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.72%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Participant Name:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="63%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:63.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#171;Name&#187;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.72%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Issuer Name:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="63%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:63.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Macerich Company</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.72%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Class&nbsp;of Security:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="63%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:63.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Common Stock, par value
  $.01 per share</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="32%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:32.72%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Number of Securities:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="63%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:63.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#171;Shares&#187;</font>
  shares</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No Security</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS STATEMENT IS
MERELY A RECORD OF THE RIGHTS OF THE ADDRESSEE AS OF THE TIME OF ITS
ISSUANCE.&#160; DELIVERY OF THIS STATEMENT, OF
ITSELF, DOES NOT CONFER ANY RIGHTS UPON THE RECIPIENT.&#160; THE STATEMENT IS NEITHER A NEGOTIABLE
INSTRUMENT NOR A SECURITY.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Availability of
Further Information Concerning the Capital Stock of the Corporation</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Corporation is
authorized to issue three classes of capital stock which are designated as
Common Stock, Preferred Stock and Excess Stock.&#160;
The Corporation will furnish to any stockholder on request and without
charge a full statement of the designations and any preferences, conversion and
other rights, voting powers, restrictions, limitations as to dividends,
qualifications and terms and conditions of redemption of the stock of each
class which the Corporation is authorized to issue, and the differences in the
relative rights and preferences between the shares of each series to the extent
they have been set, and the authority of the Board of Directors to set the
relative rights and preferences of subsequent series.&#160; Such request may be made to the Secretary of
the Corporation or to its transfer agent.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=9,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="14",CHK=281480,FOLIO='9',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-11_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 04:10 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Restrictions on
Transfer</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The transferability
of Restricted Stock is subject to the terms and conditions contained in the
Award Agreement and the Plan.&#160; A copy of
the Award Agreement is on file in the office of the Secretary of the
Corporation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The securities
represented by this certificate are also subject to restrictions on ownership
and transfer for the purpose of the Corporation&#146;s maintenance of its status as
a real estate investment trust under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as
amended (the &#147;Code&#148;).&#160; Except as
otherwise provided pursuant to the charter of the Corporation, no Person may (1)&nbsp;Beneficially
Own shares of Equity Stock in excess of 5.0% (or such greater percentage as may
be provided in the charter of the Corporation) of the number or value of the
outstanding Equity Stock of the Corporation (unless such Person is an Excluded
Participant), or (2)&nbsp;Beneficially Own Equity Stock that would result in
the Corporation being &#147;closely held&#148; under Section&nbsp;856(h)&nbsp;of the Code
(determined without regard to Code Section&nbsp;856(h)(2)&nbsp;and by deleting
the words &#147;the last half of&#148; in the first sentence of Code Section&nbsp;542(a)(2)&nbsp;in
applying Code Section&nbsp;856(h)), or (3)&nbsp;Beneficially Own Equity Stock
that would result in Common Stock and Preferred Stock being beneficially owned
by fewer than 100 Persons (determined without reference to any rules&nbsp;of
attribution).&#160; Any Person who attempts to
Beneficially Own shares of Equity Stock in excess of the above limitations must
immediately notify the Corporation.&#160; All
capitalized terms in this paragraph have the meanings defined in the
Corporation&#146;s charter, as the same may be further amended from time to time, a
copy of which, including the restrictions on ownership or transfer, will be
sent without charge to each stockholder who so requests.&#160; Transfers or other events in violation of the
restrictions described above shall be null and void <i>ab initio</i>,
and the purported transferee or purported owner shall acquire or retain no
rights to, or economic interest in, any Equity Stock held in violation of these
restrictions.&#160; The Corporation may redeem
such shares upon the terms and conditions specified by the Board of Directors
in its sole discretion if the Board of Directors determines that a Transfer or
other event would violate the restrictions described above.&#160; In addition, if the restrictions on ownership
or transfer are violated, the shares of Equity Stock represented hereby shall
be automatically exchanged for shares of Excess Stock which will be held in
trust for the benefit of a Beneficiary.&#160;
Excess Stock may not be transferred at a profit.&#160; The Corporation has an option to acquire
Excess Stock under certain circumstances.&#160;
The foregoing restrictions may also delay, defer or prevent a change of
control of the Corporation or other transaction which could be in the best
interests of stockholders.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Corporation
will furnish information about all of the restrictions on transferability of
these securities to the stockholder, on request and without charge.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.29</font></b></p>

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FORM&nbsp;OF STOCK UNIT AWARD AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THE MACERICH COMPANY</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">STOCK UNIT AWARD AGREEMENT<br>
2003 EQUITY INCENTIVE PLAN</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>
