<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="16",CHK=720155,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-17_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 28 01:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Exercisability&nbsp;of&nbsp;Option</u></b>.&#160; The Option shall vest and become exercisable
during its term [in percentage installments of] [for] the aggregate number of
shares of Common Stock of the Corporation in accordance with the Vesting
Schedule as set forth above and with and subject to the applicable provisions
of the Plan and this Agreement.&#160; The
Option may be exercised only to the extent the Option is exercisable and
vested, and, subject to Section&nbsp;1.8 of the Plan, during the Optionee&#146;s
lifetime, only by the Optionee.&#160; In no
event may the Optionee exercise the Option after the Expiration Date as
provided above.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Cumulative Exercisability</u></b>.&#160; To the extent the Optionee does not at the
time of a particular exercise purchase all the shares that the Optionee may
then exercise, the Optionee has the right cumulatively thereafter to purchase
any of such shares not so purchased until the Option terminates or expires.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">No Fractional Shares;
Minimum Exercise</u></b>.&#160;
Fractional share interests shall be disregarded, but may be cumulated.&#160; No fewer than 100 shares may be purchased at
any one time, unless the number purchased is the total number at the time
exercisable under the Option.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Exercise&nbsp;of&nbsp;Option</u></b>.&#160; To the extent vested and exercisable, the
Option may be exercised by the delivery to the Corporation of a written
exercise notice stating the number of shares to be purchased pursuant to the
Option accompanied by payment of the aggregate Exercise Price of the shares to
be purchased and the payment or provision for any applicable employment or
other taxes or withholding for taxes thereon.&#160;
Subject to Section&nbsp;6.4 of the Plan, the Option shall be deemed to
be exercised upon receipt and approval by the Corporation of such written
exercise notice accompanied by the aggregate Exercise Price and any other
payments so required, as permitted pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Method
of Payment of Option</u></b>. Payment of the aggregate Exercise Price
shall be by any of the following, or a combination thereof, at the election of
the Optionee:</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; in cash or by electronic funds transfer, or
by check payable to the order of the Corporation, in the full amount of the
purchase price of the shares and the amount (if any) required to satisfy any
applicable withholding taxes; or</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; by delivering a properly executed exercise
notice together with irrevocable instructions to a broker to promptly deliver
to the Corporation the amount of sales proceeds necessary to pay the aggregate
Exercise Price and, unless otherwise allowed by the Committee, any applicable
tax withholding, subject to compliance with applicable law and cashless
exercise procedures approved by the Corporation; or</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; by delivery of shares of Common Stock that
have been held by the Optionee for at least six months, in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.2(b)&nbsp;of
the Plan, subject to compliance with applicable law.</font></h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="16",CHK=913751,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-17_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 28 01:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other payment methods may
be permitted only if expressly authorized by the Committee with respect to the
Option or all options under and consistent with the terms of the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Continuance of Employment
Required</u></b>.&#160; Except as
otherwise provided in Section&nbsp;6, the vesting schedule requires continued
service through each applicable vesting date as a condition to the vesting of
the applicable installment and rights and benefits under this Agreement.&#160; Partial service, even if substantial, during
any vesting period will not entitle the Optionee to any proportionate vesting
or avoid or mitigate a termination of rights and benefits upon or following a
termination of employment or service as provided in Section&nbsp;5 or 8 below
or under the Plan.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Effect&nbsp;of&nbsp;Termination&nbsp;of&nbsp;Employment
on Exercise Period</u></b>.&#160; If
the Optionee&#146;s employment by either the Corporation or any subsidiary
terminates, the Option and all other rights and benefits under this Agreement
terminate, except that the Optionee may, at any time within the applicable
period below after the Severance Date, exercise the Option to the extent the
Option was exercisable on the Severance Date and has not otherwise expired or
terminated:</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; If the Optionee&#146;s employment terminates for
any reason other than Total Disability or death, Retirement or for Cause, the
Optionee shall have three months after the Severance Date to exercise the
Option to the extent the Option was exercisable on the Severance Date.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; If the Optionee&#146;s employment terminates as a
result of Total Disability or death, the Optionee (or the Optionee&#146;s Personal
Representative or Beneficiary, as the case may be) shall have 12 months after
the Severance Date to exercise the Option to the extent the Option was
exercisable on the Severance Date.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; If the Optionee&#146;s employment terminates as a
result of Retirement, the Optionee (or the Optionee&#146;s Personal Representative
or Beneficiary, as the case may be) shall have 12 months after the Severance
Date to exercise the Option to the extent the Option was exercisable on the
Severance Date (provided that, with respect to an ISO, after three months the
Option will no longer be exercisable as an ISO) to the extent the Option was
exercisable on the Severance Date.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; If the Optionee&#146;s employment terminates for
Cause, the Option shall terminate as of the Severance Date.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding the
foregoing exercise periods after the Severance Date, to the extent the Option
was otherwise an ISO, the Option will qualify as an ISO only if it is exercised
within the applicable exercise periods for ISOs and meets all other
requirements of the Code for ISOs; and, in the case of a Total Disability that
is not a permanent and total disability within the meaning of Section&nbsp;22(e)(3)&nbsp;of
the Code, only if the Option is exercised within three months of the Severance
Date.&#160; If the Option is not exercised
within the applicable exercise periods or does not meet such other requirements,
the Option will be rendered a NQSO.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=3,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="16",CHK=839952,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-17_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 28 01:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Qualified Termination Upon or Following Change in
Control Event.</u></b></font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[Subject to Section&nbsp;20,]
If the Optionee upon or not later than 12 months following a Change in Control
Event has a Qualified Termination (as defined in Section&nbsp;7.1(gg) of the
Plan) or terminates his or her employment for Good Reason, then any portion of
the Option that has not previously vested shall thereupon vest, subject to the
provisions of Sections 6.2(a), 6.2(e), 6.4 and 6.5 of the Plan and Sections 7,
8 and 12 of this Agreement.&#160; As used in
this Agreement, the term &#147;Good Reason&#148; means a termination of employment by the
Optionee for any one or more of the following reasons, to the extent not remedied
by the Company within a reasonable period of time after receipt by the Company
of written notice from the Optionee specifying in reasonable detail such
occurrence, without the Optionee&#146;s written consent thereto: (1)&nbsp;an adverse
and significant change in the Optionee&#146;s position, duties, responsibilities or
status with the Company;&#160; (2)&nbsp;a
change in the Optionee&#146;s principal office location to a location farther away
from the Optionee&#146;s home which is more than 30 miles from the Optionee&#146;s
principal office; (3)&nbsp;the taking of any action by the Company to eliminate
benefit plans without providing substitutes therefor, to materially reduce
benefits thereunder or to substantially diminish the aggregate value of the
incentive awards or other fringe benefits; provided that if neither a surviving
entity nor its parent following a Change in Control Event is a publicly-held
company, the failure to provide stock-based benefits shall not be deemed Good
Reason if benefits of comparable value using recognized valuation methodology
are substituted therefor; and provided further that a reduction or elimination
in the aggregate of not more than 10% in aggregate benefits in connection with
across the board reductions or modifications affecting persons similarly
situated of comparable rank in the Company or a combined organization shall not
constitute Good Reason; (4)&nbsp;any reduction in the Optionee&#146;s Base Salary;
or (5)&nbsp;any material breach by the Company of any written employment or
management continuity agreement with the Optionee.&#160; For purposes of the definition of &#147;Good
Reason,&#148; the term &#147;Base Salary&#148; means the annual base rate of compensation
payable as salary to the Optionee by the Company as of the Optionee&#146;s date of
termination, before deductions or voluntary deferrals authorized by the
Optionee or required by law to be withheld from the Optionee by the Company,
and salary excludes all other extra pay such as overtime, pensions, severance
payments, bonuses, stock incentives, living or other allowances, and other
benefits and perquisites.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Adjustments Upon Specified
Events</u></b>.&#160; As provided in Section&nbsp;6.2
of the Plan, upon the occurrence of certain events relating to or affecting the
Corporation&#146;s stock contemplated by Section&nbsp;6.2 of the Plan, the Committee
shall, in such manner, to such extent (if any) and at such times as it deems
appropriate and equitable in the circumstances, make adjustments in the number,
amount and type of shares (or other securities or property) subject to the
Option, the Exercise Price and the securities deliverable upon exercise of the
Option (or any combination thereof) or provide for a cash payment or the
assumption, substitution or exchange of the Option or the shares or other
securities subject to the Option, based upon the distribution or consideration
payable to stockholders generally.&#160; All
rights of the Optionee hereunder are subject to such adjustments and other
provisions of the Plan.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Possible
Early Termination of Award</u></b>.&#160;
As permitted by Section&nbsp;6.2(b)&nbsp;of the Plan, and without
limiting the authority of the Committee under other </font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="16",CHK=879325,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-17_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 28 01:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">provisions of Section&nbsp;6.2
of the Plan or Section&nbsp;6 of this Agreement, the Committee retains the
right to terminate the Option, to the extent it has not vested, upon a
dissolution of the Corporation or a reorganization event or transaction in
which the Corporation does not survive (or does not survive as a public company
in respect of its outstanding common stock).&#160;
This Section&nbsp;8 is not intended to prevent future vesting (including
provision for future vesting) if the Option (or a substituted award) remains
outstanding following a Change in Control Event.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Change in Subsidiary&#146;s
Status; Leaves of Absence</u></b>.&#160;
If the Optionee is employed only by an entity that ceases to be a
subsidiary, this event is deemed for purposes of this Agreement to be a
termination of the Optionee&#146;s employment by the Company other than a
termination for Cause, Total Disability, Retirement or death of the
Optionee.&#160; Absence from work caused by
military service, authorized sick leave or other leave approved in writing by
the Company or the Committee shall not be considered a termination of
employment by the Company for purposes of Section&nbsp;5 only if reemployment
upon the expiration of such leave is required by contract or law, or such leave
is for a period of not more than 90 days.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Additional Provisions Applicable
to </u></b><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">ISOs</u></b>.</h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">ISO Value Limit</u></b>.&#160; If the aggregate fair market value of the
shares with respect to which ISOs (whether granted under the Option or
otherwise) first become exercisable by the Participant in any calendar year
exceeds $100,000, as measured on the applicable award dates, the limitations of
Section&nbsp;2.3 of the Plan shall apply and to such extent the Option will be
rendered a NQSO.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Notice of Sale</u></b>.&#160; The Participant agrees to notify the
Corporation of any sale or other disposition of any shares if such sale or
disposition of any shares occurs within two years after the Award Date or
within one year after the date of exercise of any Option intended as an ISO.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Transferability</u></b>.&#160; In accordance with Section&nbsp;1.8 of the
Plan and the Code, an ISO is not transferable by the Optionee other than by
will or the laws of descent and distribution, and is exercisable during the
Optionee&#146;s lifetime only by the Optionee.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Tax Withholding</u></b>.&#160; If any portion of the Option is rendered a
NQSO in accordance with the terms hereof or applicable law, the Participant
shall pay or make provision for the payment of any applicable withholding and
employment taxes upon exercise of the Option.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Limitation
on Exercise of Option</u></b>.&#160;
The Optionee will not be entitled to receive Common Stock upon exercise
of the Option to the extent that it will cause the Optionee to Beneficially or
Constructively Own Equity Shares in excess of the Ownership Limit.&#160; If the Optionee exercises any portion of this
Option which upon delivery of the Common Stock would cause the Optionee to
Beneficially or Constructively Own Equity Shares in excess of the Ownership
Limit, the Corporation has </font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="16",CHK=428760,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-17_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 28 01:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the right to deliver to
the Optionee, in lieu of Common Stock, a check or cash in the amount equal to
the Fair Market Value of the Common Stock otherwise deliverable on the date of
exercise (minus any amounts withheld pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.5 of the Plan).</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Limitations
on Acceleration and Reduction in Benefits in Event of Tax Limitations</u></b>.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Limitation
on Acceleration</u></b>.&#160;
Notwithstanding anything contained herein [(except as otherwise provided
in Section&nbsp;20 hereof)] or in the Plan or any other agreement to the
contrary, in no event shall the vesting of the Option be accelerated pursuant
to Section&nbsp;6.3 of the Plan or Section&nbsp;6 hereof to the extent that the
Company would be denied a federal income tax deduction for such vesting because
of Section&nbsp;280G of the Code and, in such circumstances, the Option will
continue to vest in accordance with and subject to the other provisions hereof.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Reduction in Benefits</u></b>.&#160; If the Optionee would be entitled to
benefits, payments or coverage hereunder and under any other plan, program or
agreement that would constitute &#147;parachute payments,&#148; then, notwithstanding any
other provision hereof, such &#147;parachute payments&#148; shall be reduced or modified
in such manner, if any, as may be specified in [the MCA referenced in Section&nbsp;20
hereof, in which case the provisions of Section&nbsp;12(a)&nbsp;hereof shall
not apply, and, to the extent permitted by the MCA, in] any other then-existing
agreement between the Company and the Optionee (other than any Stock Option
Agreement, Stock Appreciation Right Agreement or Restricted Stock Award
Agreement under Plan).&#160; If after the
application of any &#147;parachute payment&#148; reduction provisions in any such other
agreement the provisions of Section&nbsp;12(a)&nbsp;hereof continue to apply to
the vesting of the Option hereunder, then the Optionee may designate by written
notice to the Secretary of the Corporation the order in which &#147;parachute
payments&#148; under this Employee Stock Option Agreement and any other Stock Option
Agreements, Stock Appreciation Right Agreements and Restricted Stock Award
Agreements under the Plan shall be reduced or modified so that the Company is
not denied federal income tax deductions for any &#147;parachute payments&#148; because
of Section&nbsp;280G of the Code.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Determination
of Limitations</u></b>.&#160; The term &#147;parachute
payments&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in and be determined in accordance
with Section&nbsp;280G of the Code and regulations issued thereunder.&#160; All determinations required by this Section&nbsp;12,
including without limitation the determination of whether any benefit, payment
or coverage would constitute a parachute payment, the calculation of the value
of any parachute payment and the determination of the extent to which any
parachute payment would be nondeductible for federal income tax purposes
because of Section&nbsp;280G of the Code, shall be made by an independent
accounting firm (other than the Corporation&#146;s outside auditing firm) having
nationally recognized expertise in such matters selected by the Committee.&#160; Any such determination by such accounting
firm shall be binding on the Corporation, its Subsidiaries and the Optionee.</font></h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="16",CHK=800603,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-17_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 28 01:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Optionee not a Stockholder</u></b>.&#160; Neither the Optionee nor any other person
entitled to exercise the Option shall have any of the rights or privileges of a
stockholder of the Corporation as to any shares of Common Stock until the
issuance and delivery to him or her of a certificate evidencing the shares
registered in his or her name.&#160; No
adjustment will be made for dividends or other rights as a stockholder as to
which the record date is prior to such date of delivery.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14.&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">No Guarantee of Continued
Employment.</u></b>&#160; Nothing
contained in this Agreement or the Plan constitutes an employment or service
commitment by the Company, affects the Optionee&#146;s status as an employee at will
who is subject to termination without cause, confers upon the Optionee any
right to remain employed by the Company, interferes in any way with the right
of the Company at any time to terminate such employment, or affects the right
of the Company to increase or decrease the Optionee&#146;s other compensation or
benefits.&#160; Nothing in this Section&nbsp;14,
however, is intended to adversely affect any independent contractual right of
the Optionee without his or her consent thereto.&#160; Employment for any period of time (including
a substantial period of time) after the Award Date will not entitle the
Optionee to any proportionate vesting or avoid or mitigate a termination of
rights and benefits upon or following a termination of employment if the
express conditions to vesting pursuant to Section&nbsp;1 or 6 have not been
satisfied.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Non-Transferability
of Option</u></b>.&#160; The Option and
any other rights of the Optionee under this Agreement or the Plan are
nontransferable except as provided in Section&nbsp;1.8 of the Plan.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Notices</u></b>.&#160; Any notice to be given under the terms of
this Agreement shall be in writing and addressed to the Corporation at its
principal office located at 401 Wilshire Boulevard, Suite&nbsp;700, Santa
Monica, California 90401, to the attention of the Corporate Secretary and to
the Optionee at the address given beneath the Optionee&#146;s signature hereto, or
at such other address as either party may hereafter designate in writing to the
other.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Effect of Award Agreement</u></b>.&#160; This Agreement shall be binding upon and
inure to the benefit of any successor or successors of the Corporation, except
to the extent the Committee determines otherwise.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18.&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Entire
Agreement; Governing Law</u></b>.&#160;
The Plan is incorporated herein by reference.&#160; [Subject to Section&nbsp;20 below,] The Plan
and this Agreement constitute the entire agreement of the parties with respect
to the subject matter hereof and supersede in their entirety all prior undertakings
and agreements of the Company and the Optionee with respect to the subject
matter hereof, and may not be modified adversely to the Optionee&#146;s interest
except by means of a writing signed by the Company and the Optionee.&#160; The constructive interpretation, performance
and enforcement of this Agreement and the Option shall be governed by the
internal substantive laws, but not the choice of law rules, of the State of
Maryland.</font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="16",CHK=91008,FOLIO='7',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KA-17_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 28 01:11 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Plan</u></b>.&#160; The Option and all rights of the Optionee
with respect thereto are subject to, and the Optionee agrees to be bound by,
all of the terms and conditions of the provisions of the Plan, incorporated
herein by reference, to the extent such provisions are applicable to Awards granted
to Eligible Persons.&#160; The Optionee
acknowledges receipt of a copy of the Plan, which is made a part hereof by this
reference, and agrees to be bound by the terms thereof.&#160; Unless otherwise expressly provided in other
Sections of this Agreement, provisions of the Plan that confer discretionary
authority on the Committee do not (and shall not be deemed to) create any
rights in the Optionee unless such rights are expressly set forth herein or are
otherwise in the sole discretion of the Committee specifically so conferred by
appropriate action of the Committee under the Plan after the date hereof.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20.&#160;&#160; <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">[&nbsp;&nbsp;Other
Agreements</u></b>.&#160; If any
provision of this Agreement is inconsistent with any provision of the
Management Continuity Agreement between the Corporation and Participant and as
it may be amended from time-to-time (the &#147;MCA&#148;), the provisions of the MCA
shall control and shall be deemed incorporated herein by reference<b>.&nbsp;&nbsp;]&nbsp;&nbsp;[</b>&nbsp;&nbsp;<b>This provision and the language in brackets in
Sections 6, 12(a), 12(b)&nbsp;and 18 are to be included only in agreements with
Optionees subject to the MCA.&nbsp;&nbsp;]</b></font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="49%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="49%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">

  </td>
  <td width="49%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.0%;">

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.31
<SEQUENCE>17
<FILENAME>a2189901zex-10_31.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.31
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.31</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THE MACERICH COMPANY</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NON-QUALIFIED STOCK
OPTION GRANT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS GRANT dated as of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ,
by The Macerich Company, a Maryland corporation (the &#147;<b>Corporation</b>&#148;), to &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(the &#147;<b>Director</b>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">W I T N E S S E T H</font></u></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Corporation has adopted The
Macerich Company 2003 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#147;<b>Plan</b>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the
services rendered and to be rendered by the Director, the Corporation hereby
grants an option (the &#147;<b>Option</b>&#148;) to
the Director pursuant to and subject to the Plan and upon the terms and
conditions evidenced hereby, which Option is not intended as and shall not be
deemed to be an incentive stock option within the meaning of Section&nbsp;422
of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font face="Times New Roman">Option Grant</font></u><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; This Agreement evidences the grant to the
Director, as of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ,
(the &#147;<b>Option Date</b>&#148;), of an Option to purchase
an aggregate of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
shares of Common Stock, par value $0.01 per share, subject to the terms and
conditions of and to adjustments provided in or pursuant to the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font face="Times New Roman">Exercise
Price</font></u><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; The Option entitles
the Director to purchase all or any part of the Option shares, to the extent
then exercisable, at a price per share of <b>$&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b>,
which represents the Fair Market Value of the shares on the Option Date.</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font face="Times New Roman">Option
Exercisability and Term</font></u><font face="Times New Roman">.</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Except as
earlier permitted by or pursuant to the Plan or by the Compensation Committee,
the Option shall not become exercisable and no shares may be purchased by
exercise of the Option until the expiration of six months after the Option
Date.&#160; The exercisability of the Option
requires continued service through the date the Option becomes exercisable as a
condition to the vesting of the rights and benefits under this Agreement.&#160; Partial service, even if substantial, prior
to the date the Option becomes exercisable will not entitle the Director to any
proportionate vesting or avoid or mitigate a termination of rights and benefits
upon or following a termination of service as provided in Section&nbsp;8.5 of
the Plan, except as otherwise expressly provided in the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">The Option
shall terminate on the earlier of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ,
or the earlier termination date under the terms of the Plan, including but not
limited to Section&nbsp;8.5, 8.6 or 6.2.</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font face="Times New Roman">Service</font></u><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; The Director agrees to serve as a director in
accordance with the provisions of the Corporation&#146;s Articles of Incorporation,
bylaws and applicable law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2189901",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="17",CHK=804940,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK105:[08ZDX2.08ZDX15702]31357-2-KE-01_ZDX15702.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Feb 27 00:41 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font face="Times New Roman">General
Terms</font></u><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; The Option and this
Grant are subject to, and the Corporation and the Director agree to be bound
by, the provisions of the Plan that apply to the Option (including but not
limited to Sections 1.8, 6.2, 6.4 and Article&nbsp;8 of the Plan), and such
provisions are incorporated herein by this reference.&#160; If there is any conflict or inconsistency
between the terms and conditions of this Agreement and of the Plan, the terms
and conditions of the Plan shall govern.&#160;
The Director acknowledges receiving a copy of the Plan and reading its
applicable provisions.&#160; Capitalized terms
not otherwise defined herein shall have the meaning assigned to such terms in
the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Corporation has
executed this Agreement as of the date first above written.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="354" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:265.55pt;">

  </td>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.32
<SEQUENCE>18
<FILENAME>a2189901zex-10_32.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.32
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 10.32</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THE
MACERICH COMPANY</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">RESTRICTED
STOCK AWARD AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2003
EQUITY INCENTIVE PLAN<br>
(NON-EMPLOYEE DIRECTOR AWARDS)</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
